MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  LL13  postcode area of Wrexham affecting properties in St. Georges Crescent and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:56AM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:43PM on 20th April 2021.
